text.0: with hymns of praise their sons have told aloud the Ṛbhus mighty deeds.
text.1: who allsupporting have enjoyed the earth as twere a mother cow.
text.2: bring forth the god with song divine being jātavedas hitherward.
text.3: to bear our gifts at once to heaven.
text.4: he here a goddevoted priest led forward comes to sacrifice.
text.5: like a car covered for the road he glowing knows himself the way.
text.6: this agni rescues from distress as twere from the immortal race.
text.7: a god yet mightier than strength a god who hath been made for life.
